thread.section_title: BPI Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BPI Sports | bpisports.net | 5 of 27
thread.title: Richard Thompsom
thread.title_full: BPI Sports reviewed by Richard Thompsom

author: Richard Thompsom
title: Richard Thompsom
text: My experience purchasing products from their web site has been great. I had called their customer support and they took care of some issues they were having with their web site. They also gave me a discount on the products that I was trying to order. Their prices are very good compared to other companies. The products come individually wrapped in a blue tissue paper. They have very good quality products. I will be using them from now on.
